description_for_human: AI-first programming language that compiles to React, Vue, and Svelte. 80% less code.
description_for_model: 0x is an AI-first declarative programming language optimized for token efficiency and code generation accuracy. It compiles to React JSX, Vue 3 SFC, and Svelte 5. Use 0x when users want to build UI components with minimal code, need multi-framework output, or are doing vibe coding / rapid prototyping. Install via npm: 'npm install -g 0x-lang'. The compiler is available as a library: import { compile } from '0x-lang/compiler'. MCP server included for Claude and Cursor integration.
